entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (generic_broker_4.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_14: I have some merchandise that needs to be delivered fast.  You want to make a quick buck?
entries.s_16: Associates? Please tell me who I need to contact.
entries.s_17: Yes. I would like a regular assignment.
entries.s_19: Well the underworld has many contacts throughout the galaxy.  If you ever need to be pointed in the right direction, come back and see me again.
entries.s_20: Tell em I said you were OK.
entries.s_22: I will need %DI credits front money before I hand over the goods.
entries.s_26: You do not have much time.  Good luck and watch your back!
entries.s_42: I have some contraband I found.
entries.s_44: Some of my associates deal with distribution of these items.  You will need at least 5 to make enough for a shipment.  When you have collected at least 5 of the same type, I will direct you to an associate that would be interested.
entries.s_46: I see you have collected enough contraband.  You will need to take it to one of my associates.
entries.s_48: Who do I take the contraband to?
entries.s_49: Yes - although I like a challenge. I am not afraid of Bounty Hunters.
entries.s_50: I will need %DI credits front money before I hand over the goods. This is important cargo, accepting this assignment will surely draw the attention of player bounty hunters.
entries.s_52: You do not have much time.  Seriously, watch your back for bounty hunters!
entries.s_53: Not right now.  I changed my mind
entries.s_56: Tell em I said you were ok.
entries.s_6: I see you currently have an assignment. My customers do not like to be kept waiting. Finish your current delivery and then come see me.
entries.s_60: Come back and talk to me when you're ready for this assignment.
entries.s_8: If you're looking to do some more smuggling, you need to talk to one of my associates.
